p: The HPLC-MS/MS analysis was performed on an Agilent 1260 Infinity system (Agilent, Santa Clara, CA, USA) coupled with an AB API 2000 triple quadrupole mass spectrometer (Applied Biosystems, Foster City, CA, USA) using an electrospray ionization source (ESI). The data were obtained and processed by means of Analyst 1.6.1 software (AB Sciex, Framingham, MA, USA).
